title: Remove domain configuration UI and related frontend code

requirements.summary: Remove the in-app domain configuration UI so users are no longer prompted to choose/apply domain slugs or shown an applied domain URL anywhere in the app.
acceptanceCriteria: The Upcoming dashboard no longer renders the DomainSlugSuggestionsCard (or any equivalent domain-setup UI).
No user-facing text in the app references applying/configuring a domain, domain slugs, or shows a public URL as part of an in-app success state.
Authenticated and unauthenticated user flows (login, profile setup, tabs, contacts, gifts, upcoming birthdays) continue to work without errors after removing the domain UI.

file_operations.description: Remove the DomainSlugSuggestionsCard import and JSX render so the Upcoming dashboard no longer shows any domain-setup prompt (do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui).
Delete the domain configuration card component that prompts users to select/apply a domain and displays a public URL success state.

requirements.summary: Remove unused domain-related hooks/utilities and eliminate domain-related backend calls from the UI so the frontend builds cleanly without unused imports or lint issues.
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend compiles successfully after removing the domain UI and related imports.
The app does not invoke domain-related hooks/mutations (e.g., suggestion fetching or configureDomain) during normal navigation.

file_operations.description: Remove domain configuration hooks (including calls to getConfiguredDomain/configureDomain) so the UI no longer performs domain-related backend calls.
Remove the domain slug suggestion hook to prevent any suggestion-fetching behavior or related caching from being triggered.
Remove domain slug validation/normalization utilities if they are no longer referenced after deleting the domain UI/hooks, ensuring no unused-import errors remain.
